an8.86:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu carikam caramano mahata bhikkhusanghena saddhim yena icchanangalam nama kosalanam brahmanagamo tadavasari.
an8.86:1.2: Tatra sudam bhagava icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an8.86:1.4: “samano khalu bho gotamo sakyaputto sakyakula pabbajito icchanangalam anuppatto icchanangale viharati icchanangalavanasande.
an8.86:1.5: Tam kho pana bhavantam gotamam evam kalyano kittisaddo abbhuggato:
an8.86:1.7: sadhu kho pana tatharupanam arahatam dassanam hoti’”ti.
an8.86:2.1: Atha kho icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika tassa rattiya accayena pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya yena icchanangalavanasando tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bahidvarakotthake atthamsu uccasadda mahasadda.
an8.86:2.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma nagito bhagavato upatthako hoti.
an8.86:2.3: Atha kho bhagava ayasmantam nagitam amantesi:
an8.86:2.4: “ke pana te, nagita, uccasadda mahasadda kevatta manne macchavilope”ti?
an8.86:2.5: “Ete, bhante, icchanangalaka brahmanagahapatika pahutam khadaniyam bhojaniyam adaya bahidvarakotthake thita bhagavantamyeva uddissa bhikkhusanghanca”ti.
an8.86:2.6: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an8.86:2.7: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi. Yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an8.86:2.8: so tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya”ti.
an8.86:3.3: Yena yeneva dani, bhante, bhagava gamissati tanninnava bhavissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an8.86:3.4: Seyyathapi, bhante, thullaphusitake deve vassante yathaninnam udakani pavattanti;
an8.86:3.5: evamevam kho, bhante, yena yeneva dani bhagava gamissati tanninnava bhavissanti brahmanagahapatika negama ceva janapada ca.
an8.86:4.1: “Maham, nagita, yasena samagamam, ma ca maya yaso.
an8.86:4.2: Yo kho, nagita, nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi assa akicchalabhi akasiralabhi. Yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an8.86:4.3: so tam milhasukham middhasukham labhasakkarasilokasukham sadiyeyya.
an8.86:5.1: devatapi kho, nagita, ekacca nayimassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhiniyo assu akicchalabhiniyo akasiralabhiniyo, yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an8.86:5.2: Tumhakampi kho, nagita, sangamma samagamma sanganikaviharam anuyuttanam viharatam evam hoti:
an8.86:5.3: ‘na hi nuname ayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhino assu akicchalabhino akasiralabhino. Yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an8.86:5.4: Tatha hi paname ayasmanto sangamma samagamma sanganikaviharam anuyutta viharanti’.
an8.86:6.1: Idhaham, nagita, bhikkhu passami annamannam angulipatodakena sanjagghante sankilante.
an8.86:6.3: ‘na hi nuname ayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhino assu akicchalabhino akasiralabhino. Yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an8.86:6.4: Tatha hi paname ayasmanto annamannam angulipatodakena sanjagghanti sankilanti’.
an8.86:7.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhu passami yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutte viharante.
an8.86:7.3: ‘na hi nuname ayasmanto imassa nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhino assu akicchalabhino akasiralabhino. Yassaham nekkhammasukhassa pavivekasukhassa upasamasukhassa sambodhasukhassa nikamalabhi akicchalabhi akasiralabhi.
an8.86:7.4: Tatha hi paname ayasmanto yavadattham udaravadehakam bhunjitva seyyasukham passasukham middhasukham anuyutta viharanti’.
an8.86:8.1: Idhaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami gamantaviharim samahitam nisinnam.
an8.86:8.3: ‘idani imam ayasmantam aramiko va upatthahissati samanuddeso va. Tam tamha samadhimha cavessati’ti.
an8.86:8.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gamantaviharena.
an8.86:9.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne pacalayamanam nisinnam.
an8.86:9.3: ‘idani ayamayasma imam niddakilamatham pativinodetva arannasannamyeva manasi karissati ekattan’ti.
an8.86:9.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an8.86:10.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne asamahitam nisinnam.
an8.86:10.3: ‘idani ayamayasma asamahitam va cittam samadahissati, samahitam va cittam anurakkhissati’ti.
an8.86:10.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an8.86:11.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam aranne samahitam nisinnam.
an8.86:11.3: ‘idani ayamayasma avimuttam va cittam vimuccissati, vimuttam va cittam anurakkhissati’ti.
an8.86:11.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an8.86:12.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami gamantaviharim labhim civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
an8.86:12.2: So tam labhasakkarasilokam nikamayamano rincati patisallanam, rincati arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani;
an8.86:12.4: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno na attamano homi gamantaviharena.
an8.86:13.1: Idha panaham, nagita, bhikkhum passami arannikam labhim civarapindapatasenasanagilanapaccayabhesajjaparikkharanam.
an8.86:13.2: So tam labhasakkarasilokam patipanametva na rincati patisallanam, na rincati arannavanapatthani pantani senasanani.
an8.86:13.3: Tenaham, nagita, tassa bhikkhuno attamano homi arannaviharena.
an8.86:14.1: Yasmaham, nagita, samaye addhanamaggappatipanno na kanci passami purato va pacchato va, phasu me, nagita, tasmim samaye hoti antamaso uccarapassavakammaya”ti.
